page.title: 05FIRE SERVICE IN HOUNSLOW
page.content: {Men and Duties-}100 men in 4 groups of 25.Shift, 9am.-6pm.6pm.-9am. Two days on and 2 days off .{Appliances-4 Turntable ladder(extends to 30m) Rescue Tender,2 ordinary fire engines. {Equipment-on fire appliances}-3 types of hoses i)attached to water supply on engine ii)hoses for connecting to fire hydrant iii)chimney hose. There is also an attachment for filtering water from rivers etc.Ladders-12-15m and a special roof ladder.Search light,Siren.Tools-for gaining entry axes,crowbars etc.Radio-to keep in contact with control room. Breathing equipment-lasts 45min. Rescue lines first aid box.{Fire Fighting uniform - Chemical resistant rubber boots with steel toe caps. Yellow leggings,wool coat,neckerchief to stop sparks,cork helmet,black belt with axe,torch, gloves,distress signal.
